text: Saint-Louis is a region in the north of Senegal. The regional capital is Saint-Louis. It is on the border with Mauritania. As of the 2013 census, 870,629 people lived there. It has an area of . == Départements == There are three départements: * Dagana Département * Podor Département * Saint-Louis Département Category:Regions of Senegal
title: Saint-Louis Region
